job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., T- Mobile, you know who we are. We have already five years in a row the quickest network in the Netherlands. With our challenger mind-set we challenge ourselves and the market to connect everyone with the possibilities of these days. Daring, responsible and working together; those are the key competencies. You can expect the following form us:
     * For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself! We are supporting you with this via our campus; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/?lang=en
     * You are in the lead, so old fashion evaluation and performance interviews are not our way of working. You make sure that your manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests. We call this great conversations, you can find more information via; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/
     * You will get 2000 enthusiastic and driven colleagues;
     * Workshops, sportive events, T-Schnee, drinks and amazing parties organized by Young T-Mobile.

   There is a lot possible within T- Mobile but you have to take initiative yourself. Be enthusiastic, do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!, There are lots of opportunities within T-Mobile, but you have to take the initiative. Be enthusiastic! Is something missing or could something be better? Go ahead, do it differently. After a first digital introduction with a recruiter, you have an interview with the hiring manager. Still enthusiastic? Then there will be a 2nd interview! If you, and we, are even more enthusiastic after that, you will receive an offer and you can join Team Magenta!

   - Besides about 2000 enthusiastic colleagues, we also offer the following:
   - Excellent salary
   - Variable bonus plan
   - Pension plan
   - Personal learning budget
   - Working internationally
   - T-Mobile subscription plan
   - Freedom to work
   - Exchangeable holidays

Wat ga je bij ons leren?

   What will you learn with us
   For us, learning is just as normal as telephoning. You are responsible for your own development and you decide how, what and when you learn. We support you in this! Go to www.campus.t-mobile.nl for more information.

   How do we do this?
   You are in the lead, so we don't do old-fashioned performance interviews and assessments. You ensure that your manager and your colleagues are aware of your goals and development. We call this Great Conversations, more information can be found at https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/.
job_details.full_text:
Linux Engineer

The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies. Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software., T- Mobile, you know who we are. We have already five years in a row the quickest network in the Netherlands. With our challenger mind-set we challenge ourselves and the market to connect everyone with the possibilities of these days. Daring, responsible and working together; those are the key competencies. You can expect the following form us:
     * For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself! We are supporting you with this via our campus; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/?lang=en
     * You are in the lead, so old fashion evaluation and performance interviews are not our way of working. You make sure that your manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests. We call this great conversations, you can find more information via; https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/
     * You will get 2000 enthusiastic and driven colleagues;
     * Workshops, sportive events, T-Schnee, drinks and amazing parties organized by Young T-Mobile.

   There is a lot possible within T- Mobile but you have to take initiative yourself. Be enthusiastic, do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!, There are lots of opportunities within T-Mobile, but you have to take the initiative. Be enthusiastic! Is something missing or could something be better? Go ahead, do it differently. After a first digital introduction with a recruiter, you have an interview with the hiring manager. Still enthusiastic? Then there will be a 2nd interview! If you, and we, are even more enthusiastic after that, you will receive an offer and you can join Team Magenta!

   - Besides about 2000 enthusiastic colleagues, we also offer the following:
   - Excellent salary
   - Variable bonus plan
   - Pension plan
   - Personal learning budget
   - Working internationally
   - T-Mobile subscription plan
   - Freedom to work
   - Exchangeable holidays

Wat ga je bij ons leren?

   What will you learn with us
   For us, learning is just as normal as telephoning. You are responsible for your own development and you decide how, what and when you learn. We support you in this! Go to www.campus.t-mobile.nl for more information.

   How do we do this?
   You are in the lead, so we don't do old-fashioned performance interviews and assessments. You ensure that your manager and your colleagues are aware of your goals and development. We call this Great Conversations, more information can be found at https://www.t-mobilecampus.nl/home/great-conversations/.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Linux system administration, infrastructure improvement through automation, and operational tasks. It does not mention any specific AI/ML technologies, models, or frameworks, nor does it involve tasks related to predictive modeling or generative AI development. Therefore, it falls outside the scope of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer roles and is classified as Ambiguous.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensuring excellent operations' and 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' directly relates to the operational aspects of managing and maintaining systems, which aligns with the broader principles of operations engineering, even if not specifically MLOps in an AI context.
The mention of 'automation' in improving the infrastructure landscape aligns with the operational efficiency goals found in operations engineering.
The description mentions 'building and expanding (new) systems and platforms' and 'enhancing existing infrastructure', which involves development and integration tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'enhancing existing infrastructure' implies development work on current systems.
The phrase 'infra delivery to our internal customers' indicates a need to understand and serve the needs of internal stakeholders, aligning with business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'carrying out life cycle management of systems and software' is a core responsibility in operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software

job_tasks.justification: The repeated emphasis on 'learning', 'development', and 'deciding how, what and when you learn' strongly points to a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

The phrases 'you are in the lead', 'you have to take initiative yourself', 'Go ahead, change it!', and 'do it differently' all highlight the importance of taking initiative, ownership, and driving change.
The instruction to 'take initiative yourself' directly maps to the concept of ownership and proactivity.
job_tasks.phrase: you have to take initiative yourself

job_tasks.justification: The encouragement to 'Go ahead, change it!' or 'do it differently' if 'something is missing or could be better' implies a proactive approach to identifying and solving problems.
job_tasks.phrase: do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!

soft_skills.phrase: decide how, what and when you develop yourself
do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!
manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests
